description: Zipf power law test on swarm lesson citation distribution
hypothesis: Lesson citations follow power law with α ≈ 1.0 (Zipf), confirming ISO-8 isomorphism
interpretation: Lesson citation distribution closely follows Zipf's law (α=0.900 ≈ 1.0, R²=0.845). ISO-8 isomorphism CONFIRMED: swarm knowledge corpus exhibits the same scale-free power law as natural language word frequency. A small number of lessons dominate citations (~10 lessons account for most references).
